title: Join a youtube network
body:
Does anyone want to become part of LoL based  youtube channel? 
requirements:
Age 15+
Able to upload original content of high standard once a Month
Microphone
Name change (vClub ____)
Have a level 30 account
Be available to make videos with other members


add me in skype or ingame:  emmettvonschreiber
{{item:3113}}

replies.body: No, if you already have a youtube account, i just give you access to upload
